name: Greg Quest
description:
Don't press W, it's a debug key I left in by accident. Fullscreen recommended. Join Greg in his quest! Explore grasslands, houses, abandoned nuclear power plants, and more!?

(not really much more, that's basically all of it.)

Controls: A & D to move, shift to run, space to jump, S to slide, and mouse to aim.

Have fun.

Made for the 1-Bit Weekend Game Jam
